headline.print_headline: Missouri Protests Call Attention to Police 'Militarization'
headline.main: Missouri Protests Call Attention to Police 'Militarization'

lead_paragraph: A U.S. military program that sends armored cars, camouflage and other battlefield equipment to police departments is under fresh scrutiny as demonstrators in Ferguson, Missouri, enter their fifth straight night of protests over the death of an unarmed black teenager.
